Replace.Text: The number of natural wonders that will appear on the map.
Choose and/or prioritize which Natural Wonders may appear on the map.
Click here to cycle through selected, prioritized, and deselected states for this Natural Wonder. Click the appropriate checkbox to directly (de)select or (de)prioritize it.

When checked, this Natural Wonder will be considered for placement at game start.[NEWLINE]When unchecked, it will be added to the exclusion list and will [COLOR_RED]NOT[ENDCOLOR] be considered.[NEWLINE]Exclusion and prioritization are mutually exclusive.[NEWLINE]Selection does not guarantee placement; plot requirements and the slider value are respected.

When checked, this Natural Wonder will be added to the priority list. At game start, items in the priority list will be considered [COLOR_Blue]BEFORE[ENDCOLOR] other selections.[NEWLINE]When unchecked, it will be considered according to the status of its selection box.[NEWLINE]Prioritization and exclusion are mutually exclusive.[NEWLINE]Priority does not guarantee placement; plot requirements and the slider value are respected.
